vstore.framework.node

Class NodeDistanceMetric

  • java.lang.Object
    • vstore.framework.node.NodeDistanceMetric

  • public class NodeDistanceMetric
extends java.lang.Object
    Distance metric class which calculates the distance metric for a storage node. Provides additional methods for sorting a list of storage nodes by the distance metric and others.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      NodeDistanceMetric()

      Calculates the distance metric of a storage node.

    • Constructor Detail

      • NodeDistanceMetric

        public NodeDistanceMetric()

    • Method Detail

      • getDistanceMetric

        public static float getDistanceMetric(NodeInfo n)
        Calculates the distance metric of a storage node. Currently it is a simple metric based on the type of the node.
        Parameters:
        n - The node object for which to calculate the distance metric
        Returns:
        The distance metric (lower values are better)

      • sortNodesByDistanceMetric

        public static java.util.List<NodeInfo> sortNodesByDistanceMetric(java.util.List<NodeInfo> nodeInfos)
        Sorts the given list by the distance metric.
        Parameters:
        nodeInfos - The list of storage nodes to sort by the distance metric
        Returns:
        The sorted list

      • getBestDlCloud

        public static int getBestDlCloud(java.util.List<NodeInfo> nodes,
                                 int start,
                                 int end)
        Returns the position of the best corenet or cloud in the given list
        Parameters:
        nodes - The list of storage nodes
        start - The start index from where to search in the list
        end - The end index up to where to search in the list
        Returns:
        The best cloud or corenet node corresponding to the bandwidth.
